command: until nc -z apisix-etcd.default.svc.cluster.local 2379; do echo waiting for etcd `date`; sleep 2; done;
initContainers.name: wait-etcd

command: until nc -z apisix-admin.ingress-apisix.svc.cluster.local 9180 ; do echo waiting for apisix-admin; sleep 2; done;
initContainers.name: wait-apisix-admin
